transferProxyOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the proxy to a new address.

claimProxyOwnership.description: Claims the ownership of the proxy after it has been transferred.

proxyOwner.description: Returns the current owner of the proxy.

pendingProxyOwner.description: Returns the address of the pending new owner of the proxy.

upgradeTo.description: Upgrades the contract to a new implementation.

ProxyOwnershipTransferred.description: Emitted when the ownership of the proxy is transferred.

NewPendingOwner.description: Emitted when a new pending owner is set for the proxy.

Upgraded.description: Emitted when the contract is upgraded to a new implementation.
